Others: The Cubs compiled 24 runs in three games at Dodger Stadium, averaging 5.11 runs per road game compared to 4 runs per game at Wrigley Field.
The Cubs' road performance has been better than their home performance this season.
The Cubs faced a tough loss on Wednesday night but took two of three from the Dodgers.
Manager Craig Counsell expressed puzzlement over the Cubs' inconsistent performance at home.
